K12dhvajkeu:3: namo bhagavate dhvajāgra rājāya tathāgatāya arhate samyak sambuddhāya tadyathā /
K12dhvajkeu:4: jaya jaya vijaya vijaya jayavāhini-sam gari prabhañjani prabhañjani sarva śatruṇām
K12dhvajkeu:5: jambhaya jambhaya stambhaya stambhaya mohaya mohaya bhagavati jayavāhini mātha mātha
K12dhvajkeu:6: pra-mātha pra-mātha grasa grasa hasa hasa huṃ huṃ lambodari trinetre caturmukhe caturvaktre
K12dhvajkeu:7: catur daṃṣṭre catur bhuje asi musala khaḍga triśūla vajra dhāraṇīrakṣa rakṣa mām /
K12dhvajkeu:8: bhagavati hana hana daha daha paca paca mātha mātha pramātha pramātha huṃ huṃ phaṭphaṭbhañja bhañja sarva śatrūṇām /
K12dhvajkeu:9: dhvajāgra keyure tisṭhat tisṭhat triṭa ulkā dhāraṇi trailokyanātha vidhvaṃśaya
K12dhvajkeu:10: para sainya rakṣa rakṣa māṃ cala cala cili cili culu culu kala kala kili kili kulu kulu muncaṭṭa hāsaya vidhvaṃśaya parasainya bhramaya /
K12dhvajkeu:11: buddha satyena dharma satyena saṃgha satyena satya vādināṃ satyena buddha satyāmatikrama dharma satyāṃ atikrama saṃgha satyāṃ atikrama satya vādinaṃ satyamatikrama /
K12dhvajkeu:12: lambodare kuṭṭa kuṭṭa kuṭṭya kuṭṭya rudra mānaya biṣṇu mānaya candra sūrya mānaya
K12dhvajkeu:13: trailokya adhipatya mānaya sarva devo mānaya sarva yakṣa rākṣasa gandharva kinnara
K12dhvajkeu:14: mahoraga mānaya vidhvamsaya mama sarva śatru vaḥ rangha rangha ranghāpaya ranghāpaya
K12dhvajkeu:15: jvala jvala puṣpa mālini liḍhi liḍhi triṭa triṭa bhṛkuti mukhaḥ parasainya kurucchedana
K12dhvajkeu:16: karaṇha ha hi hi hu hu he he riṇi riṇi riṇā māte jayantu dhvaje /
K12dhvajkeu:17: buddhāvalokite rakṣa rakṣa mama bhagavatāvalokite svāhā /
K12dhvajkeu:20: sarva graha nakṣatra dā me karaṇa svāhā /
